Trade/Device Name(s): OKmeter Direct Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OKmeter Direct Blood Glucose Monitoring System for quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for the quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from various sites for self-testing by individuals with diabetes at home to monitor diabetes control; not for diagnosis, screening, or neonatal use
